artist: Artist: rOBNOXIOUS; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of two figures swimming, with text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 60 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Shut Up & Love the Rain
